subtasks.description: API routes - status, stats, config endpoints
subtasks.notes:
API routes for status, stats, and config endpoints fully implemented and verified. Includes:
- GET /api/status - System status with uptime and component health
- GET /api/stats - Statistics for detections, objects, screenshots, and performance
- GET /api/config - Current configuration with sensitive values masked
- POST /api/config - Update configuration with validation
All endpoints include proper error handling, type hints, docstrings, and security measures.

Screenshot and events API endpoints verified and completed. All 5 endpoints fully implemented:
- GET /api/events - Event history with detection analysis
- GET /api/screenshots - List screenshots with metadata
- GET /api/screenshots/<id> - Get specific screenshot metadata
- GET /api/screenshots/<id>/<type> - Serve image files
- DELETE /api/screenshots/<id> - Delete screenshot sets

All endpoints include proper error handling, type hints, docstrings, and ScreenshotManager integration. RESTful design with pagination support via limit query parameter. Implementation was completed during subtask 14-02 as bonus endpoints.

MJPEG stream endpoint verified and completed. Implementation includes:
- GET /api/stream endpoint with MJPEG streaming
- generate_mjpeg_frames() generator function
- Proper MJPEG protocol with multipart/x-mixed-replace content type
- Correct boundary markers (--frame\r\n)
- Uses encode_frame_to_bytes() utility function for JPEG encoding
- Placeholder frame with "Camera feed not available" text (appropriate until camera integration)
- Complete docstrings and type hints
- Ready for camera feed integration

The endpoint follows MJPEG streaming best practices and will seamlessly integrate with the camera component once available. Implementation was present from previous subtasks but verified and committed for 14-04.

**Event Handlers (namespace: /events):**

- ping - Connection keepalive mechanism

**Configuration:**
